channel.title: Relationship Talk Radio
channel.description: Love and Marriage are at the core of Relationship Talk Radio. Your hosts, Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero explore all aspects of marriage from the mundane to the maddening in this weekly half hour podcast.
channel.itunes:author: Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero
channel.itunes:summary: Exploring all aspects of love and marriage from the mundane to the maddening.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Where Happily Ever After Meets Reality

item.title: Love and Respect in Marriage, Relationship Roles & More
item.description: The conversation continues with Jo Jo Tabares of Art of Eloquence. Roy and Jo Jo talk about society's influence in marriage and the changing trends affecting relationships today.
item.itunes:author: Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero
item.itunes:summary: The conversation continues with Jo Jo Tabares of Art of Eloquence. Roy and Jo Jo talk about society's influence in marriage and the changing trends affecting relationships today.

item.title: Communication for Couples
item.description: What does good communication look like in real life? We talk with communication expert Jo Jo Tabares from Art of Eloquence about specific situations that are common in marriages and she gives great advice on how to deal with them so both partners feel respected and heard.
item.itunes:author: Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero
item.itunes:summary: What does good communication look like in real life? We talk with communication expert Jo Jo Tabares from Art of Eloquence about specific situations that are common in marriages and she gives great advice on how to deal with them so both partners feel respected and heard.

item.title: Episode 3 - Brain Based Communication for a Healthy Marriage
item.description: Continuing from last week's interview, Susan Fox shares more about how to improve communication and happiness through our knowledge and awareness of the brain based differences between men and women.
item.itunes:author: Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero
item.itunes:summary: Continuing from last week's interview, Susan Fox shares more about how to improve communication and happiness through our knowledge and awareness of the brain based differences between men and women.

item.title: Episode Two - Brain Talk - Head and Heart Connections
item.description: Featuring Brain Dialog Researcher and certified hypnotherapist, Susan Fox on how the male and female brains differ and how to use this knowledge to connect with your spouse with less frustration and more meaning than ever before.
item.itunes:author: Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero
item.itunes:summary: Featuring Brain Dialog Researcher and certified hypnotherapist, Susan Fox on how the male and female brains differ and how to use this knowledge to connect with your spouse with less frustration and more meaning than ever before.

item.title: Episode One
item.description: The debut episode where you'll discover what "Where Happily Ever After Meets Reality" means, meet our hosts Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero and learn what future episodes of Relationship Talk Radio are going to cover.
item.itunes:author: Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero
item.itunes:summary: The debut episode where you'll discover what "Where Happily Ever After Meets Reality" means, meet our hosts Patrysha Korchinski and Roy Montero and learn what future episodes of Relationship Talk Radio are going to cover.
